goals__remit: The responsible production, sale, and marketing of spirits and wines around the world. In the context of the Register, we seek to represent the European and global policy and commercial interests of Brown-Forman and the responsible beverage alcohol sector in dialogue with European institutions and other members of civil society.
relevant_communication: Occasional meetings and correspondence with Commission and EP staff /members
